plain_text:
United States Court of Appeals
                     For the First Circuit


No. 04-1069

                         UNITED STATES,

                            Appellee,

                               v.

                  HÉCTOR LUIS MÁRQUEZ-FIGUEROA,

                      Defendant, Appellant.


                          ERRATA SHEET


     The opinion of this Court issued on July 6, 2006 is corrected
as follows:

     On Page 5, Line 17 it should read "count based upon . . ."
